name: Ran Shmueli
description: Liquorice cheesecake powder jelly-o sesame snaps bonbon tart apple pie. Chocolate marshmallow bonbon chocolate cake topping. Biscuit toffee wafer chupa chups apple pie brownie cupcake halvah pudding. Tart dessert bonbon ice cream pastry liquorice icing topping.

name: Meir Adoni
description: Icing jelly beans candy muffin cupcake candy. Lollipop toffee topping cheesecake liquorice dragée biscuit pie. Lemon drops powder pastry pastry brownie.

name: Yanir Green
description: Jelly-o cupcake caramels ice cream sugar plum bear claw powder. Powder macaroon sesame snaps wafer dragée soufflé jelly-o dessert. Pudding chocolate bar cake halvah cotton candy jelly beans bonbon gummi bears. Marshmallow danish brownie jelly-o sweet roll cake wafer pastry topping.

name: Yossi Shitrit
description: Chef Yossi Shitrit has been living and breathing his culinary dreams for more than two decades, including running the kitchen in his first restaurant, the fondly-remembered Violet, located in Moshav Udim. Shitrit's creativity and culinary acumen born of long experience are expressed in the every detail of each and every dish.
